Plot: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.
Title: Into the Storm
Actors: Richard Armitage, Sarah Wayne Callies, Matt Walsh, Max Deacon
tomatoConsensus: Clumsily scripted and populated with forgettable characters, Into the Storm has little to offer beyond its admittedly thrilling special effects.
